sourcesContent:
<template>
<v-card color="#08182b" class="ticker-form">
  <v-form v-model="valid">
    <v-container>
      <v-row >
        <v-col
          cols="12"
          md="2"
        >
          <v-text-field
            v-model="Ticker"
            :rules="nameRules"
            background-color="white"
            outlined
            label="Ticker"
            required
          ></v-text-field>
        </v-col>

        <v-col
          cols="12"
          md="2"
        >
          <v-text-field
            v-model="Quantity"
            :rules="quantityRules"
            outlined
            background-color="white"
            label="Quantity"
            required
          ></v-text-field>
        </v-col>

        <v-col class="d-flex" cols="12" sm="2">
        <v-select
           background-color="white"
          :items="items"
          label="Position Type"
          outlined
        ></v-select>
      </v-col>
      <v-col class="d-flex" cols="12" sm="2">
        <v-select
           background-color="white"
          :items="tof"
          label="Time in Force"
          outlined
        ></v-select>
      </v-col>
      <v-col class ="d-flex" cols="12" sm="2">
        <v-btn large >Submit</v-btn>
      </v-col>
      </v-row>
    </v-container>
  </v-form>
</v-card>
</template>


<script>
  export default {
    name: 'Ticker',
    data: () => ({
      items: ['Foo', 'Bar', 'Fizz', 'Buzz'],
      tof: [],
      valid: false,
      Ticker: '',
      nameRules: [
        v => !!v || 'Ticker is required',
      ],
      Quantity: '',
      quantityRules: [
        v => v > 0 || 'Quantity must be greater than 0',
        v => !v.data.isInteger() || 'Quantity must be an integer'
      ],
    }),
  }
</script>
<style>
.ticker-form{
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: row;
  align-items: center;
  width:75%;
}
</style>
